abstract: Shares of Groupon tumbled 28 percent by midday on Friday, to a low of $2.82, after the company posted yet another set of disappointing quarterly results.
snippet: Shares of Groupon tumbled 28 percent by midday on Friday, to a low of $2.82, after the company posted yet another set of disappointing quarterly results.

headline.main: A Run on Groupon’s Shares as Growth Slows Again

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
